overview: When two of the cutest pups around want to learn about animals, who do they call? Professor Twiggles of course! She knows all there is to know about the animal kingdom! Join Moxie and Bo as they go on an African safari to learn about the amazing creatures who live in the jungle, the savanna and everywhere in between! You're in for a wild ride and woof-tastic fun when you adventure with Pup School!
title: Pup School: African Safari
